definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: The judge stayed the sentence until the following day.
sentences.chinese: 法官把判決拖德溱二天才宣讀。

sentences.english: Court acquits her of indecent assault.
But due to lack of evidence, the court couldn't pass a sentence and released Chu temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 因無確鑿證據，知府不敢草率判決，暫將朱爾旦釋放。

sentences.english: The sentence of the court was quashed on appeal.
sentences.chinese: 經過上訴，法院的判決被宣佈無效。

sentences.english: Murray appeared impassive as a court officer read the verdict.
sentences.chinese: 審判員當庭宣讀了判決書，默裏表情漠然。

sentences.english: Judges should be impartial, sometimes even desensitised, to give a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 法官必須公平地，甚至撇開個人惡好去判決。

sentences.english: Last, the author discusses the relationship between judgment for conductingagain and judgment for performance.
sentences.chinese: 最後，本文對重作判決和履行判決的關係進行了梳理。

sentences.english: Last, the author discusses the relationship between judgment for conductingagain and judgment for performance.
sentences.chinese: 最後，本文對重作判決和履行判決的關係進行了梳理。

sentences.english: And I would have supported the decision.
sentences.chinese: 而我會願意支持那樣的判決。

sentences.english: There were other factors that made this decision significant.
sentences.chinese: 使這個判決如此重要的還有其他因素。

sentences.english: Typically gw gold, such sentences are commuted to life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，這種判決都會減刑爲無期徒刑。

sentences.english: The order came from an arbitration court in the Hague. Greg Morsbach reports.
sentences.chinese: 這項判決是由海牙的一個仲裁法院定的。

sentences.english: The execution notice requires our company to assist the execution of the verdict.
sentences.chinese: 傳達了協助執行通知書，要求我公司協助執行判決。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court did not hand down a sentence, but ordered the Appeals Court to re-examine the case.
sentences.chinese: 但最高法院沒有宣佈判決，而是責令上訴庭複議此案。

sentences.english: He seems to prefer intellectual counteroffensives to decrees and crackdowns.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎更傾向於用知性的反擊來判決和痛擊對手。

sentences.english: If an adminis. rative sanction is. obviously unfair, it may be amended by judgment.
sentences.chinese: 行政處罰顯失公正的，可以判決變更。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
